summary: VEHICLE IS UD2600 NISSAN 2002 TRUCK.  DEALER MAINTAINS THAT THE CHASIS PROBLEM IS NOT HIS RESPONSIBILITY.  IT LISTS TO DRIVERS SIDE.  CANNOT LEVEL THE BODY WITH THE FRAME.  TRIED NEW SPRINGS AND STILL LISTS.  HAS BEEN SHIMMED TO LEGAL ACCEPTABLE SPECS. SUSPECT ALSO THAT PARTS HAVE BEEN REMOVED AND USED ON OTHER VEHICLES.VEHICLE NOT TO DOT SPECIFICATION. LOSING JOBS, MONEY AND PATIENCE.
